page.title: 09HOUSING,CHANGES 1814-1985
page.content: It is interesting to compare the settlement pattern within this area with that shown on the original drawings (made at a scale of 2 inches to 1 mile) by the Ordnance Survey in 1814. This was the source from which the 1st Edition of the One Inch to One Mile map was prepared and published in 1831.Another important source is the Tithe Map for Cray parish, produced in 1840. Copies of these maps are held in the National Library of Wales in Aberystwyth. Of the thirty houses shown on these and modern maps, 22 have remained un- changed since 1814, seven houses have disappeared (all since 1840) and 1 new house has been built.
